content:
Not all springs are warm.
The feeling of slowly awakening from the cold
is an experience that spring can call its own.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
So in spring, I would lie down before the huge windows of the library,
watching everyone running around outside.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content: Summer is the perfect season for slushies, rainbow ice cream, and lemonade... Yee~ Now where did I put that takeout menu?
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Of course, I never act on those dreams.
Untangling a wet tail is quite an undertaking.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Whenever winter comes around,
I can't help but think
that there's a touch of mystery in the air~.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊
闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Once, during a research expedition,
I passed through a bubble world that was completely covered in ice and snow,
and the inhabitants told me that was their spring!
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Yet even from behind the glass of the windows,
the warmth of the spring sun, the fragrance of flowers in the air, and the laughter of my friends
allowed me to experience the beauty of spring all the same.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content: Did you know that summer is also known as "the flourishing season"? This is the time of year when flora flourishes and fruits ripen. But all I can think about is lemon soda and orange slushies...
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Just thinking about it makes me feel all cozy inside.
Well, guess I'll go to the library today!
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, would you like to join me?
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content: It's these small yet beautiful things that spur me on to stand up against the pressures of life. It's quite mysterious~.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
When I was little, I had a weak immune system.
The pollen in the air in spring
always makes me feel unwell.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
The last season of the year has crept up on us.
The air is cold and crisp,
and maybe we'll be able to make snowballs before long.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Sometimes I can't help but wonder,
perhaps it's not just a dream?
I can sense a twinge of mystery~.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
You know, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
whenever midsummer comes around,
I always dream about spending the whole day cooling off in the sea.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊
闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
Each year in spring, I collect a certain kind of flower petal.
It's small and pink,
and when brewed in black tea, the fragrance it produces is quite something.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
If I remain standing amidst the relentless snowfall,
I wonder... would I eventually be covered in snow,
and turn into a kind of snow-white sculpture?
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content: The temperature is quietly rising each day and the chirping calls of the insects in the grass start to sound. That's right, summer is here!{开心}
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, you are looking radiant!
Are you using some secret skincare product or is it just the effect of the summer sun?
How mysterious indeed~.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content: [Winter Bond Lv. 34]
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
If that's their spring, what's their winter like?
But later I discovered
that their winter is actually quite warm — The universe is truly full of wonders.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊

content:
You know what, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>?
I feel like I have a special connection with snow—
I often dream about being stood amidst heavy snowfall.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1005幻雪_单一闲聊
